Author an academic essay focusing on the ethics of artificial intelligence and its influence on society.
Provide a summary for this article titled "The effectiveness of cognitive-behavioral therapy in treating depression.....
Summarize this essay titled "An analysis of the impact of social media on mental health.
Condense this story titled "An Elderly Gentleman in the Village..

Translate the following sentences into Korean: "The impact of climate change on global food security."
